issue.title: darkreader.org
issue.body:

issue.title: ridomovies.tv
issue.body:

issue.title: www.foxbusiness.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.foxbusiness.com/retail/some-big-lots-stores-remain-open-bankruptcy-court-approves-deal-new-buyer](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.foxbusiness.com%2Fretail%2Fsome-big-lots-stores-remain-open-bankruptcy-court-approves-deal-new-buyer) ### Comment > Even though I have the Adblock warning removal active, I am still seeing this. comment.body: Strangely enough the problem is fixed now. I didn't change anything. Thanks for everything though.
